source:
TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_SEQ_00Beaudefoin is looking for adventurers to help him with his Moonfire Faire duties.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_SEQ_00※本クエストは、期間限定のクエストとなります。

常夏の島の紅蓮祭調達担当ボドゥフォアンは、冒険者に手を貸してほしいようだ。

source:
TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_SEQ_01Beaudefoin has asked you to fish up some fresh haddock. Catch three of them on the North Isle of Endless Summer and deliver them to him.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_SEQ_01※本クエストは、シーズナルイベント開催中にかぎり、
　受注、進行できます。
　開催期間終了後は進行できませんので、ご注意ください。
　期間等の詳細についてはLodestoneをご覧ください。

ボドゥフォアンから、を釣ってくるよう頼まれた。「」を3匹釣り上げよう。は常夏の島北で釣ることができる。

source: TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_SEQ_02<tab>You caught three fresh haddock! Deliver them to Beaudefoin.
target: TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DD601 /var>を釣り上げた。常夏の島の「紅蓮祭調達担当ボドゥフォアン」に、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DD601 /var>」を3匹納品しよう。

source: TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_SEQ_03<tab>You delivered the fresh haddock to Beaudefoin. Speak to him again if you wish to aid in the provisioning of the Moonfire Faire.
target: TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_SEQ_03<tab>ボドゥフォアンに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DD601 /var>を渡した。料理の素材が足りず、調達に苦労している彼を、また助けてあげるのもよいだろう。

source: TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_TODO_00<tab>Fish for fresh haddock on the North Isle of Endless Summer.
TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the fresh haddock to Beaudefoin.
target: TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_TODO_01<tab>紅蓮祭調達担当ボドゥフォアンに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DD601 /var>を納品

source: TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_BEAUDEFOIN_000_000<tab>Had a feeling I might see you again this summer. And what a pleasant sight you are! You're just the one to deliver me from this seventh hell.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_BEAUDEFOIN_000_000おーいえぇい、やっぱり来たな！
この状況なら、アンタが来てくれると思ったが、
ドンピシャ正解だったぜ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_BEAUDEFOIN_000_001<tab>They're saying there are to be no Go Go Posing Rangers this year since the Bombards are not out. But I'm starting to think this resort nonsense is worse by far. I've never been so busy in all my life! You've got to help me.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_BEAUDEFOIN_000_001大炎獣が出てこねえから「火消しの戦士」はお休みだけど、
今回の「紅蓮祭」はすげえ忙しくてよ。
ワリィが、アンタの手を貸してくれ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_BEAUDEFOIN_000_010<tab>Ah, another adventurer come to help. And come at the right time. You're just the one to deliver me from this seventh hell.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_BEAUDEFOIN_000_010おーいえぇい、アンタ、手伝いの冒険者だな。
来てくれて、助かるぜ！
ワリィが、手を貸してくれ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_BEAUDEFOIN_000_020<tab>Here's what I'm hunting right now─haddock. We can't get enough of the damn things. We need every one in the ocean to fill all the orders for battered fish we're getting.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_BEAUDEFOIN_000_020ひゃっは～、助かるぜ！
アンタに手伝ってもらいたいのは、
の材料になる「」の調達だ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_BEAUDEFOIN_000_021<tab>I've never heard of a dish being so popular. Our haddock stocks simply can't keep up with the demand. I've got the festive fisher giving me all he catches, but it is still not near enough.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_BEAUDEFOIN_000_021はすげぇ人気でよ、
客の注文が多くて、材料の補充が追っつかねえんだ。
陽気な漁師からも買ってるんだが、それでも足りねー！

source: TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_BEAUDEFOIN_000_022<tab>Word is they're biting out at the North Shore. Catch three and bring them to me, would you? A grim fate awaits them, but we can hardly have a faire without food.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_BEAUDEFOIN_000_022北の島なら「」がかかるはずだから、
ちょいと3匹ほど、釣ってきてくれ。
頼んだぜ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_BEAUDEFOIN_000_030<tab>You looking to put that rod of yours to work again? I can always use more fresh haddock. Well, what are you waiting for? To the sea, with you.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_BEAUDEFOIN_000_030おーいえぇい、アンタ、手を貸してくれるのか？
それじゃ、また「」を3匹、釣ってきてくれ。
頼んだぜ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_BEAUDEFOIN_000_031<tab>Three fresh haddock, and quickly. Word is they're biting at the North Shore.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_BEAUDEFOIN_000_031おーいえぇい、「」を3匹、釣ってきてくれ。
北の島でかかるはずだからよ、頼んだぜ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_BEAUDEFOIN_000_040<tab>Have you got the three fresh haddock I asked for? Then go and cast that bloody line back in the water!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_BEAUDEFOIN_000_040「」は、釣れたかい？
北の島で釣れるはずだから、よろしく頼むぜ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_BEAUDEFOIN_000_050<tab>Those are some lively looking haddock. They'll make fine battered fish for some lucky faire-goer. Well done, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_BEAUDEFOIN_000_050ひゃっは～、ずいぶんと活きのいいじゃねえか！
これなら美味いが、作れそうだぜ！
ありがとよ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_BEAUDEFOIN_000_051<tab>Have you had a word with Hildelana, there? I don't envy the cooking that is being asked of her. Why not offer her a hand, as well?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_BEAUDEFOIN_000_051そういや、隣りにいるヒルドラナとは話したか？
あっちも大変そうだったぜ。
よければ、力を貸してやってくれ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_BEAUDEFOIN_000_060<tab>Another haul of three fresh haddock, is it? My thanks again, friend. You're doing the gods' work.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM304_02959_BEAUDEFOIN_000_060ひゃっは～、活きのいいだぜ！
助かったぜ、ありがとよ！
よければ、また手を貸してくれ！
